title: 3D Oral Reading Practice
subtitle: Oral Reading Practice
sentences: I decided that on Father’s Day, I was going to do something different for my father.
“Mum, I have learnt to cook a few dishes at my cooking class for kids. I think I can whip up a two-course lunch for Dad all by myself,” I told my mother.
“That’s a fantastic idea!” said my mother. “I’ll be your food taster.”
On the morning of Father’s Day, my father went to play golf so it was easy to prepare the meal without him knowing.
Referring to the recipe, I began preparing the ingredients needed for the main dish.
After two hours of toiling in the kitchen, the special Father’s Day lunch was ready.
When my father returned home for lunch, what a surprise he had.
I served him the tomato salad for starters followed by his favourite dish – chicken chop!
“Thank you, Son. This is the best Father’s Day ever!” he said.
